name: Discussionboard
tagline: Discussion Board Application for Sharing Thoughts
body:
### Welcome to Discussion Board

![main image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shawnlee5482/DiscussionBoard/master/discussionboard_login.png)

![topic screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shawnlee5482/DiscussionBoard/master/discussionboard_topicdetail.png)

Using Discussion Board, You can discuss specific topics with other people.
Even you can add images from various sources including Camera, Google Drive, Facebook, etc..

### Skill Set
`MongoDB` `Express` `AngularJS` `Node.JS` `Bootstrap` `Filepicker` `JWT(Javascript Web Token)` `Grunt` `Less` `Jasmine+Karma`

### Add Topic
You can create a topic by using name, description and photos.
Topic list can be browsed in the Dashboard page.
In the Dashboard page, you can see the summary of the topics (for example, number of posts and topic owner)

### Add Post
You and other people can add posts to the topic.
Posts also can include an image. 

### Image source
You can add images from multiple sources.
For example, from local computer, take a photo now, Google drive, Facebook, etc..
Integrated [FilePicker library](https://www.filestack.com/) 

### User can add comments and vote for posts
You can add comments by text only and vote for up/down

### Statistics
You can see your or other's statistics details (number of topics, posts, comments)

### Live Demo is available
[Click Here for Live Demo](http://ec2-54-236-203-12.compute-1.amazonaws.com/)

### Token Based Session Management
session is managed Using [JWT](https://jwt.io/). 
Password is stored encrypted in the server. 
Except login page and Signup page, access is protected by session management.

### Unit testing
By using Jamine testing, unit test is performed for part of the source code.
Karma runner and Jasmine is used together.
Unit test is performed for part of the source code.

### Grunt Build Tool
Grunt is used for build automation.
